result.eng: Are you still living in America?
result.ga: An bhfuil tú fós i do chónaí i Meiriceá
result.orig: An bhfuil tú fós i do chónaí i Meiriceá
result.html: An bhfuil tú fós i do chónaí i MeiriceáAre you still living in America?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil tú fós i do ċónaí i MeiriceáAre you still living in America?

result.eng: They went over to America.
result.ga: Chuaigh siad anonn go Mericeá
result.orig: Chuaigh siad anonn go Mericeá
result.html: Chuaigh siad anonn go MericeáThey went over to America.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ siad anonn go MericeáThey went over to America.

result.eng: I am going to America to work.
result.ga: Tá mé ag dul go Meiriceá ag obair
result.orig: Tá mé ag dul go Meiriceá ag obair
result.html: Tá mé ag dul go Meiriceá ag obairI am going to America to work.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag dul go Meiriceá ag obairI am going to America to work.

result.eng: Máire lives in America.
result.ga: Tá Máire ina cónaí i Meiriceá
result.orig: Tá Máire ina cónaí i Meiriceá
result.html: Tá Máire ina cónaí i MeiriceáMáire lives in America.
result.ponchtml: Tá Máire ina cónaí i MeiriceáMáire lives in America.

result.eng: There is a person from America in my class.
result.ga: Tá duine as Meiriceá i mo rang
result.orig: Tá duine as Meiriceá i mo rang
result.html: Tá duine as Meiriceá i mo rangThere is a person from America in my class.
result.ponchtml: Tá duine as Meiriceá i mo rangThere is a person from America in my class.

result.eng: Three are in America, two in Australia, another two in England and one in South Africa.
result.ga: Tá triúr i Meiriceá beirt san Astráil beirt eile i Sasana agus duine eile san Afraic Theas
result.orig: Tá triúr i Meiriceá beirt san Astráil beirt eile i Sasana agus duine eile san Afraic Theas
result.html: Tá triúr i Meiriceá beirt san Astráil beirt eile i Sasana agus duine eile san Afraic TheasThree are in America, two in Australia, another two in England and one in South Africa.
result.ponchtml: Tá triúr i Meiriceá beirt san Astráil beirt eile i Sasana agus duine eile san Afraic ṪeasThree are in America, two in Australia, another two in England and one in South Africa.

result.eng: The airplanes went back to America.
result.ga: Chuaigh na heitleáin ar ais go Meiriceá
result.orig: Chuaigh na heitleáin ar ais go Meiriceá
result.html: Chuaigh na heitleáin ar ais go MeiriceáThe airplanes went back to America.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ na heitleáin ar ais go MeiriceáThe airplanes went back to America.

result.eng: They have been living in America for years.
result.ga: Tá siad ina gcónaí i Meiriceá leis na blianta
result.orig: Tá siad ina gcónaí i Meiriceá leis na blianta
result.html: Tá siad ina gcónaí i Meiriceá leis na bliantaThey have been living in America for years.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad ina gcónaí i Meiriceá leis na bliantaThey have been living in America for years.

result.eng: She came to America before the fall of the Soviet Union.
result.ga: Tháinig sí go Meiriceá roimh thitim an Aontais Shóivéadaigh
result.orig: Tháinig sí go Meiriceá roimh thitim an Aontais Shóivéadaigh
result.html: Tháinig sí go Meiriceá roimh thitim an Aontais ShóivéadaighShe came to America before the fall of the Soviet Union.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig sí go Meiriceá roiṁ ṫitim an Aontais ṠóivéadaiġShe came to America before the fall of the Soviet Union.

result.eng: He's working for some huge corporation in America.
result.ga: Tá sé ag obair d'ollchomhlacht éigin i Meiriceá
result.orig: Tá sé ag obair d'ollchomhlacht éigin i Meiriceá
result.html: Tá sé ag obair d'ollchomhlacht éigin i MeiriceáHe's working for some huge corporation in America.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ag obair d'ollċoṁlaċt éigin i MeiriceáHe's working for some huge corporation in America.

result.eng: He spent some time in Paris before he headed to America.
result.ga: Chaith sé seal i bPáras sular thug sé aghaidh ar Mheiriceá
result.orig: Chaith sé seal i bPáras sular thug sé aghaidh ar Mheiriceá
result.html: Chaith sé seal i bPáras sular thug sé aghaidh ar MheiriceáHe spent some time in Paris before he headed to America.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ sé seal i bPáras sular ṫug sé aġaiḋ ar ṀeiriceáHe spent some time in Paris before he headed to America.

result.eng: America was definitely under attack.
result.ga: Bhí Meiriceá faoi ionsaí go cinnte
result.orig: Bhí Meiriceá faoi ionsaí go cinnte
result.html: Bhí Meiriceá faoi ionsaí go cinnteAmerica was definitely under attack.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí Meiriceá faoi ionsaí go cinnteAmerica was definitely under attack.

result.eng: He travelled to Afganistan in 1999 and accepted Osama Bin Laden's personal request that he would organize air attacks on America.
result.ga: Thaistil sé chun na hAfganastáine i 1999 agus ghlac le hiarratas pearsanta Osama Bin Laden go n-eagródh sé ionsaithe aeir i Meiriceá
result.orig: Thaistil sé chun na hAfganastáine i 1999 agus ghlac le hiarratas pearsanta Osama Bin Laden go n-eagródh sé ionsaithe aeir i Meiriceá
result.html: Thaistil sé chun na hAfganastáine i 1999 agus ghlac le hiarratas pearsanta Osama Bin Laden go n-eagródh sé ionsaithe aeir i MeiriceáHe travelled to Afganistan in 1999 and accepted Osama Bin Laden's personal request that he would organize air attacks on America.
result.ponchtml: Ṫaistil sé ċun na hAfganastáine i 1999 agus ġlac le hiarratas pearsanta Osama Bin Laden go n-eagróḋ sé ionsaiṫe aeir i MeiriceáHe travelled to Afganistan in 1999 and accepted Osama Bin Laden's personal request that he would organize air attacks on America.

result.eng: Clearly, the United States of America were planning a big revenge.
result.ga: Ba léir go raibh Stáit Aontaithe Mheiriceá ag pleanáil díoltais ollmhóir
result.orig: Ba léir go raibh Stáit Aontaithe Mheiriceá ag pleanáil díoltais ollmhóir
result.html: Ba léir go raibh Stáit Aontaithe Mheiriceá ag pleanáil díoltais ollmhóirClearly, the United States of America were planning a big revenge.
result.ponchtml: Ba léir go raiḃ Stáit Aontaiṫe Ṁeiriceá ag pleanáil díoltais ollṁóirClearly, the United States of America were planning a big revenge.

result.eng: Some people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
result.ga: Táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú Meán Fomhair ach leithscéal do Mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór
result.orig: Táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú Meán Fomhair ach leithscéal do Mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór
result.html: Táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú Meán Fomhair ach leithscéal do Mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mórSome people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
result.ponchtml: Táṫar ann a deir naċ raiḃ in ionsaiṫe an 11ú Meán Foṁair aċ leiṫscéal do Ṁeiriceá cogaḋ a ḟearaḋ ar an doṁan mórSome people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.

result.eng: Race is not discussed publicly in America.
result.ga: Ní phléitear cine i Meiriceá go poiblí
result.orig: Ní phléitear cine i Meiriceá go poiblí
result.html: Ní phléitear cine i Meiriceá go poiblíRace is not discussed publicly in America.
result.ponchtml: Ní ṗléitear cine i Meiriceá go poiblíRace is not discussed publicly in America.

result.eng: It is still the most controversial subject in America, I'd say.
result.ga: Is é an t-ábhar is conspóidí i Meiriceá go fóill é déarfainn
result.orig: Is é an t-ábhar is conspóidí i Meiriceá go fóill é déarfainn
result.html: Is é an t-ábhar is conspóidí i Meiriceá go fóill é déarfainnIt is still the most controversial subject in America, I'd say.
result.ponchtml: Is é an t-áḃar is conspóidí i Meiriceá go fóill é déarfainnIt is still the most controversial subject in America, I'd say.

result.eng: February is "Black History Month" in America.
result.ga: Is é Feabhra Mí Stair an Chine Ghoirm i Meiriceá
result.orig: Is é Feabhra Mí Stair an Chine Ghoirm i Meiriceá
result.html: Is é Feabhra Mí Stair an Chine Ghoirm i MeiriceáFebruary is "Black History Month" in America.
result.ponchtml: Is é Feaḃra Mí Stair an Ċine Ġoirm i MeiriceáFebruary is "Black History Month" in America.

result.eng: I was reminded of my first visit to America, many years ago.
result.ga: Cuireadh mo chéad chuairt ar Mheiriceá i gcuimhne dom blianta fada ó shin
result.orig: Cuireadh mo chéad chuairt ar Mheiriceá i gcuimhne dom blianta fada ó shin
result.html: Cuireadh mo chéad chuairt ar Mheiriceá i gcuimhne dom blianta fada ó shinI was reminded of my first visit to America, many years ago.
result.ponchtml: Cuireaḋ mo ċéad ċuairt ar Ṁeiriceá i gcuiṁne dom blianta fada ó ẛinI was reminded of my first visit to America, many years ago.

result.eng: He was an Irishman who had been living in America for a long time.
result.ga: Éireannach ab ea é a bhí ina chónaí i Meiriceá le fada
result.orig: Éireannach ab ea é a bhí ina chónaí i Meiriceá le fada
result.html: Éireannach ab ea é a bhí ina chónaí i Meiriceá le fadaHe was an Irishman who had been living in America for a long time.
result.ponchtml: Éireannaċ ab ea é a ḃí ina ċónaí i Meiriceá le fadaHe was an Irishman who had been living in America for a long time.

result.eng: Black people have been in America since the beginning.
result.ga: Tá Gormaigh i Meiriceá ón tús
result.orig: Tá Gormaigh i Meiriceá ón tús
result.html: Tá Gormaigh i Meiriceá ón túsBlack people have been in America since the beginning.
result.ponchtml: Tá Gormaiġ i Meiriceá ón túsBlack people have been in America since the beginning.

result.eng: Estate owners were not able to attract workers from Europe to America.
result.ga: Ní raibh úinéirí na n-eastát in ann oibrithe a mhealladh as an Eoraip ná as Meiriceá
result.orig: Ní raibh úinéirí na n-eastát in ann oibrithe a mhealladh as an Eoraip ná as Meiriceá
result.html: Ní raibh úinéirí na n-eastát in ann oibrithe a mhealladh as an Eoraip ná as MeiriceáEstate owners were not able to attract workers from Europe to America.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ úinéirí na n-eastát in ann oibriṫe a ṁeallaḋ as an Eoraip ná as MeiriceáEstate owners were not able to attract workers from Europe to America.
